ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tlmtrg.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = W -> ( Scalar ` x ) = ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 3 | 2, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( x = W -> ( Scalar ` x ) = F ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( x = W -> ( ( Scalar ` x ) e. TopDRing <-> F e. TopDRing ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_df-tvc | |- TopVec = { x e. TopMod | ( Scalar ` x ) e. TopDRing } |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( W e. TopVec <-> ( W e. TopMod /\ F e. TopDRing ) ) |
